orcs must die is a tower defense game wherein you are also a mobile tower it feels stupid easy at first but as you progress through the levels the game spikes up in both difficulty and fun the game drip feeds you new traps and abilities with every level allowing you to alter your strategy bit by bit as you figure out the best way to not have to do anything yourself  overall its quite an enjoyable game i recommend getting it while its on a salein a bundle
